description: Works well. An inbuit text editor would be nice or am I missing something here?

I've given ssh config path in options>terminal as ~/.ssh/config
but did nothing. 

getting this error

   Unable to push to 'origin' - ERROR: You're using an RSA key with SHA-1, which is no longer allowed. Please use a newer client or a different key type.
Please see https://github.blog/2021-09-01-improving-git-protocol-security-github/ for more information.
summary: It amazing but can't push to github :(

description: Great clean interface. Very nice history graph. Effective display of Diff and modified files. Commit hunks and single lines. And last, but not less important, it manages to do it all in a single window. I've tried most popular free git clients for Linux and this one is above all of them.
summary: Best free git manager for Linux!

description: I've used the original version, GitAhead, before now switching to the Gittyup fork. It's just as awesome for understanding who did what, when, and how. It's also awesome for making lots of small, useful commits out of a big diff. I can very much recommend it.
I find the interface a bit bloated but still it does a great job!
Gittyup is the best FOSS Git client I've used. It has the broadest set of features and is straightforward to use. I use it daily.
All that it needs is OAuth support for GitLab authentication, and to reliably adhere to the font size of the system.
Works well, has every feature that i need and it can successfully push to codeberg

I tried this program multiple time over a period of a couple of months but each time the file picker is opened to select a folder, the whole system freezes and becomes unresponsive. 
A search in google revealed that I'm not the only one.

summary: Seems nice, but is not working

description:
The feature set is mostly complete and can even be further improved by plugins, this is really cool!
Everything you need for day-to-day-work is there from the standard installation. 
The overview of the log messages is a bit overwhelming, but there is even a "compact mode" which is what I love. 

Overall this is an extremely good tool, just has everything I ever wished for
summary: Working great, features to no end with great presentation

description: Parece una aplicación muy completa, aunque me gustaría que la interfaz fuera algo más limpia.
summary: Cumple su tarea, aunque la interfaz es algo caótica
